fields.summary: Changing ELB properties may take very long if many ELBs are running

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

After executing the following command, the service {{loadbalancingbackend}} stays in _NOTREADY_ state.  I tried this on two different setups in the EQS.

* [hspencer-1105|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1105/] - fully distributed topology
* [hspencer-1111|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1111/] - default topology

Both showed the followed regarding {{loadbalancingbackend}} service:
_hspencer-1111_
{code}
[root@b-39 ~]# empyrean-describe-services --filter service-type=loadbalancingbackend --region @localhost
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus  10.111.5.92  notready
{code}
_hspencer-1105_
{code}
[root@a-28 ~]# empyrean-describe-services --filter service-type=loadbalancingbackend --region @localhost
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus  10.111.5.70  notready
{code}

On _hspencer-1105_ setup, I uninstalled/re-installed the service image by hand to see the behavior.  The following was returned:
{code}
[root@a-28 ~]# esi-install-image --remove-all --force
Removed emi-f02ae606
[root@a-28 ~]# esi-install-image --install-default
Installing Service Image...
Found tarball /usr/share/eucalyptus/service-images/eucalyptus-service-image-1.31.tar.xz
Decompressing tarball: /usr/share/eucalyptus/service-images/eucalyptus-service-image-1.31.tar.xz
Installing image from eucalyptus-service-image.raw
Bundling, uploading and registering image to bucket: eucalyptus-service-image-1.31
Registered image: emi-ef5f0a38
services.imaging.worker.image = emi-ef5f0a38
euctl: error (ModifyPropertyValueType): Could not change EMI ID due to: Internal error
Error: failed to set property services.loadbalancing.worker.image to emi-ef5f0a38
To set it manually run this command:
/usr/bin/euctl -U http://10.111.5.79:8773/services/Properties services.loadbalancing.worker.image=emi-ef5f0a38
[root@a-28 ~]# /usr/bin/euctl -U http://10.111.5.79:8773/services/Properties services.loadbalancing.worker.image=emi-ef5f0a38
euctl: error (ModifyPropertyValueType): Could not change EMI ID due to: Internal error
{code}

Log files from CLC of hspencer-1105 setup are attached.

*Signs*

The below message was in the /var/log/eucalyptus/cloud-tracking.log:
{code}
2015-09-02 12:29:19 DEBUG ServiceOperations        | [ec80117e-fa47] java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not change EMI ID due to: Internal error
2015-09-02 12:29:27  WARN StaticPropertyEntry      | [266130b8-43f6] Failed to set property: services.loadbalancing.worker.image because of Could not change EMI ID due to: Internal error
2015-09-02 12:29:27 DEBUG ServiceOperations        | [266130b8-43f6] java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not change EMI ID due to: Internal error
2015-09-02 12:30:56 DEBUG PropertiesManager        | [a3758c31-b1c0] Performing euca operation:

Caused by: groovy.lang.MissingPropertyException: No such property: EucalyptusActivityTasks for class: Script11
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.ScriptBytecodeAdapter.unwrap(ScriptBytecodeAdapter.java:50)
        at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.callsite.PogoGetPropertySite.getProperty(PogoGetPropertySite.java:49)

{code}
fields.summary: 'loadbalancingbackend' in NOTREADY state after 'esi-install-image --install-default' is executed

comments.body: This is a regression introduced in https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus/commit/f2513213abb3ef740ea54803759af875989ade8f
I'd also ignore some of outputs in the logs. They are due to my debugging.
There was regression and it's fixed.

Fixed.
